Prepare fixtures

$ CAROOT=testdata/ mkcert install

$ CAROOT=testdata/ mkcert \
  -ecdsa \
  -cert-file=./test-cert.pem \
  --key-file=./test-key.pem \
  example.com "*.example.com" example.test localhost 127.0.0.1

$ openssl x509 \
  -inform PEM \
  -outform DER \
  -text \
  -in rootCA.pem \
  -out rootCA.der

$ openssl x509 \
  -inform PEM \
  -outform DER \
  -text \
  -in test-cert.pem \
  -out test-cert.der

$ openssl pkcs8 \
  -topk8 \
  -inform PEM \
  -outform DER \
  -nocrypt \
  -in test-key.pem \
  -out test-key.der
